meanings.definition: A small card used in film production to organize scenes or shots.
meanings.sent1: The director carefully arranged the filmcards to plan the movie scenes.
meanings.sent2: I collected filmcards from different movies to study their shot compositions.
meanings.sent3: The filmcards decided to have a race to see who could organize the fastest.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a filing cabinet, each memory neatly stored like filmcards.
meanings.sent5: The filmcards fluttered in the wind, each one a piece of the movie puzzle.

meanings.definition: A set of cards with images from a movie or film.
meanings.sent1: She treasured her collection of filmcards from classic films.
meanings.sent2: The filmcards displayed iconic scenes from the blockbuster movie.
meanings.sent3: The filmcards threw a party to celebrate their famous movie moments.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a gallery, each thought a vivid filmcard on display.
meanings.sent5: The filmcards sparkled with memories, each one a snapshot of cinematic magic.

meanings.sent1: The photographer will filmcards of the stunning landscape.
meanings.sent2: I love to filmcards of nature's beauty with my camera.
meanings.sent3: The artist decided to filmcards of the city skyline using a unique technique.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like cameras, constantly filming filmcards of life's moments.
meanings.sent5: He would filmcards of his travels, each image a story waiting to be told.
